name: Sky Liberator Warplane: Air Supremacy Fight Game
name_original: Sky Liberator Warplane: Air Supremacy Fight Game
description:
Sky Liberator is the best warplane simulator to play a role of airforce pilot. Trained to destroy the enemy at their own bases. You have jet fighter, stealth jets. Ride her, fly right into the enemy territories and destroy their bases. First learn the art of flight, for this practice you have to fly to certain points, so you can get training required, skills, experience for combat mission. you have to face number mission that including invading force, their bases in water and land.
Features:
- best fighter jet flight simulation
- learn the art and science of flying with this Jet simulator
- number of jets including stealth technology
- best jet controls
- well designed enemy bases
- challenging missions to perform
- rival fighter from enemy forces.

How to Play
- Select the control method you like
- tilt or use touch to control jet
- practice to fly from certain points
- destroy army bases
- fight with rival jet fighter from enemy forces.
Support
RationalVerx
